mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time,COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.net_amount) winlose, SUM(d.valid_bet_amount) validamount FROM ds_ag_live d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT IFNULL(t.id,22000) game_type, IFNULL(t.game_name,'ag机率') game_name, COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.net_amount) winlose, SUM(d.valid_bet_amount) validamount FROM ds_ag_live d LEFT JOIN ds_game_type t ON d.game_type = t.out_game_code AND t.fk_live_id=2 and t.parent_id in (21,22)
GROUP BY d.game_type
select count(*) as bet_count,sum(bet_amount) as betamount,sum(valid_bet_amount) as validamount,sum(net_amount) as winlose from ds_ag_live
mapper.sql: id, site_id, user_pre, username, player_name, bill_no, agent_code, game_code, net_amount, win_loss_type, game_kind, game_kind_name, game_type, game_type_name, bet_amount, bet_time, valid_bet_amount, flag, play_type, currency, table_code, login_ip, recalcu_time, platform_id, platform_type, remark, round, result, before_credit, device_type, create_time, update_time, ag_flag, last_json
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ds_ag_live
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ds_ag_live (site_id, user_pre, username, player_name, bill_no, agent_code, game_code, net_amount, win_loss_type, game_kind, game_kind_name, game_type, game_type_name, bet_amount, bet_time, valid_bet_amount, flag, play_type, currency, table_code, login_ip, recalcu_time, platform_id, platform_type, remark, round, result, before_credit, device_type, create_time, update_time, ag_flag, last_json ) values (#{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userPre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{playerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gameCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{winLossType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gameKind,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gameKindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gameTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{betAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{betTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validBetAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{playType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recalcuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{round,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beforeCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
